name: Cunning Acrobat
skills: Acrobatics +7, Deception +3, Perception +3, Sleight of Hand +7, Stealth +5
languages: Any two languages and Thieves' Cant

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the acrobat can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Naturally Acrobatic
traits.desc: The acrobat has a climb speed of 30 ft. In addition, whenever it makes a running jump, the distance it can jump is increased by 3 feet.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.desc: The acrobat deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the acrobat that isn't incapacitated and the acrobat doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The acrobat makes two melee attacks: one with its shortsword and one with its dagger.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
